Verses: 1 avan Savulote Pesi Mutindha Pinpu, Yonaththaanutaiya Aaththumaa Thaaveedhin Aaththumaavote Ondraai Isaindhirundhadhu; Yonaththaan Avanaith Than Uyiraippolach Chinekiththaan.
2 savul Avanai Avan Thakappan Veettukkuth Thirumpippoka Ottaamal, Andru Mudhal Thannitaththil Vaiththuk Kontaan.
3 yonaththaan Thaaveedhaith Than Aaththumaavaip Polach Chinekiththadhinaal, Avanum Ivanum Utanpatikkaipannik Kontaarkal.
4 yonaththaan Porththukkontirundha Saalvaiyaik Kazhatri, Adhaiyum, Than Vasdhiraththaiyum, Than Pattayaththaiyum, Than Villaiyum, Than Kachchaiyaiyumkootath Thaaveedhukkuk Kotuththaan.

5 thaaveedhu Savul Thannai Anuppukira Evvitaththirkum Poi, Puththiyaaik Kaariyaththai Natappiththadhinaal, Savul Avanai Yuththamanusharinmel Adhikaariyaakkinaan; Avan Ellaa Janaththin Kankalukkum, Savulutaiya Oozhiyakkaararin Kankalukkumkootap Piriyamaayirundhaan.

6 thaaveedhu Pelisdhanaik Kondru Thirumpi Vandhapinpu, Janangal Thirumpavarumpodhum, Sdhireekal Isravelin Sakala Pattanangalilumirundhu, Aatal Paatalutan Purappattu, Melangalotum Keedhavaaththiyangalotum Sandhoshamaai Raajaavaakiya Savulukku Edhirkontuvandhaarkal.
7 andha Sdhireekal Aatippaatukaiyil: Savul Kondradhu Aayiram, Thaaveedhu Kondradhu Padhinaayiram Endru Muraimuraiyaakap Paatinaarkal.

8 andha Vaarththai Savulukku Visanamaayirundhadhu; Avan Mikundha Erichchalataindhu, Thaaveedhukkup Padhinaayiram, Enakko Aayiram Kotuththaarkal; Innum Raajaangamaaththiram Avanukku Kuraivaayirukkiradhu Endru Solli,
9 annaal Mudharkontu Savul Thaaveedhaik Kaaimakaaramaaip Paarththaan.

10 marunaalile Thevanaal Vitappatta Pollaadha Aavi Savulinmel Irangitru; Avan Veettirkulle Theerkkadharisanam Sollikkontirundhaan; Appozhudhu Thaaveedhu Thinandhorum Seykirapati, Than Kaiyinaal Suramantalaththai Vaasiththukkontirundhaan; Savulin Kaiyile Eettiyirundhadhu.
11 appozhudhu Savul Thaaveedhaich Chuvarote Serththu Uruvak Kuththippotuven Endru Eettiyai Avanmel Erindhaan; Aanaalum Thaaveedhu Vilaki Irantudharam Avanukkuth Thappinaan.
12 karththar Thaaveedhotekoota Irukkiraar Endrum Thannai Vittu Vilakipponaar Endrum, Savul Kantu, Thaaveedhukkup Payandhu,
13 avanaith Thannaivittu Appurappatuththi, Avanai Aayiramperukku Adhipadhiyaaka Vaiththaan; Appatiye Avan Janaththirku Munpaakap Pokkum Varaththumaayirundhaan.
14 thaaveedhu Than Seykaikalilellaam Puththimaanaai Natandhaan; Karththar Avanotekoota Irundhaar.
15 avan Makaa Puththimaanaai Natakkiradhaich Chavul Kantu, Avanukkup Payandhirundhaan.
16 isravelarum Yoodhaa Janangalumaakiya Yaavarum Thaaveedhaich Chinekiththaarkal; Avarkalukku Munpaaka Avan Pokkum Varaththumaayirundhaan.

17 en Kai Alla, Pelisdharin Kaiye Avanmel Vizhattum Endru Savul Ninaiththukkontu, Savul Thaaveedhai Nokki: Idho, En Mooththa Kumaaraththiyaakiya Meraavai Unakku Manaiviyaakak Kotuppen; Nee Enakku Nalla Sevakanaaimaaththiram Irundhu, Karththarutaiya Yuththangalai Nataththu Endraan.
18 appozhudhu Thaaveedhu Savulaip Paarththu: Raajaavukku Marumakanaakiradharku Naan Emmaaththiram, En Jeevan Emmaaththiram, Isravelile En Thakappan Vamsamum Emmaaththiram Endraan.
19 savulin Kumaaraththiyaakiya Meraap Thaaveedhukkuk Kotukkappatung Kaalam Vandhapodhu, Aval Mekolaaththiyanaakiya Aadhariyelukku Manaiviyaakak Kotukkappattaal.
20 savulin Kumaaraththiyaakiya Meekaal Thaaveedhai Nesiththaal; Adhu Savulukku Arivikkappattapodhu, Adhu Avanukkuch Chandhoshamaayirundhadhu.

21 aval Avanukkuk Kanniyaayirukkavum, Pelisdharin Kai Avanmel Vizhavum, Avalai Avanukkuk Kotuppen Endru Savul Enni, Thaaveedhai Nokki: Nee Ennutaiya Irantaam Kumaaraththiyinaal Indru Enakku Marumakanaavaai Endraan.

22 pinpu Savul Than Oozhiyakkaararaip Paarththu: Neengal Thaaveedhote Irakasiyamaaip Pesi: Idho, Raajaa Unmel Piriyamaayirukkiraar; Avarutaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Ellaarum Ummaich Chinekikkiraarkal; Ippozhudhum Neer Raajaavukku Marumakanaanaal Nalam Endru Sollungal Endru Karpiththaan.

23 savulin Oozhiyakkaarar Indha Vaarththaikalaith Thaaveedhin Sevikal Ketkap Pesinaarkal; Appozhudhu Thaaveedhu, Naan Raajaavukku Marumakanaakiradhu Lesaana Kaariyamaa? Naan Eliyavanum, Arpamaai Ennappattavanumaayirukkiren Endraan.
24 thaaveedhu Inna Innapati Sonnaan Endru Savulin Oozhiyakkaarar Avanukku Ariviththaarkal.

25 appozhudhu Savul: Raajaa Parisaththai Virumpaamal, Pelisdharin Nooru Nuniththolkalinaal Raajaavin Saththurukkalitaththil Pazhivaanga Viruppamaayirukkiraar Endru Thaaveedhukkuch Chollungal Endraan; Thaaveedhai Pelisdharin Kaiyinaal Vizhappannuvadhe Savulutaiya Ennamaayirundhadhu.
26 avan Oozhiyakkaarar Thaaveedhukku Indha Vaarththaikalaich Chonnapodhu, Raajaavukku Marumakanaakiradhu Thaaveedhukkup Piriyamaayirundhadhu.

27 adharkuk Kuriththa Naatkal Niraiverumunne, Thaaveedhu Ezhundhu, Than Manusharaik Koottikkontupoi, Pelisdharil Irunooruperai Vetti, Avarkal Nuniththolkalaik Kontuvandhu, Naan Raajaavukku Marumakanaakumpatikku, Avaikalai Raajaavukku Ennich Cheluththinaan; Appozhudhu Savul Than Kumaaraththiyaakiya Meekaalai Avanukku Manaiviyaakak Kotuththaan.
28 karththar Thaaveedhotirukkiraar Endru Savul Kantarindhukontaan; Savulin Kumaaraththiyaakiya Meekaalum Avanai Nesiththaal.
29 aakaiyaal Innum Adhikamaaith Thaaveedhukkup Payandhu, Thaan Uyirotirundha Naalellaam Thaaveedhukkuch Chaththuruvaayirundhaan.
30 pelisdharutaiya Pirapukkal Purappatukirapodhellaam Thaaveedhu Savulutaiya Oozhiyakkaarar Ellaaraippaarkkilum Puththimaanaai Natandhukontaan; Avan Per Mikavum Kanampetradhu.
